setValueRelative

void setValueRelative(float offset)
                      throws MicroscopeException,
                             java.rmi.RemoteException,
                             MicroscopeLockedException,
                             java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the value of the microscope relative to its current value. Throws a NumberFormatException if the current value does not correspond to a float value.

Parameters:
offset - Amount for which the current value should be changed.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.NumberFormatException - Thrown when current value is not a float.
java.lang.InterruptedException

getLowerLimit

float getLowerLimit()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the lower limit of this value. Returns Float.MIN_VALUE if this property does not have limits.

Returns:
Minimal value this property can have.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getUpperLimit

float getUpperLimit()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the upper limit of this value. Returns Float.MAX_VALUE if this property does not have limits.

Returns:
Maximal value this property can have.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
